task.title: Creating a Slice
task.shortdesc: Select a region on the waveform to create an audio slice.

prereq.p: You must have an audio chunk open in the Audio Slicer.

step.cmd: Click and drag on the waveform to select a region.
step.info: The selected region is highlighted in blue.

step.cmd: Release the mouse button to create the slice.
step.stepresult:
A new SliceCard appears in the panel below.
Audio Slice
Audio Slice

step.cmd: Fine-tune the boundaries using the ◀ and ▶ arrows on the timestamp.
step.info: Each click adjusts the time by 0.5 seconds.

result.p: The slice is created locally. Use Save All Changes to persist to the server.
